title: Why Did I Get Matched With Someone I Reported?
body:
You'd think if I reported them, I probably don't want to be on their team again...

So why do I get matched with them?

Fix the ranked system so it doesn't match people with those they've reported please.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Kivolan,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=v9a2hOOg,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-12T06:45:59.027+0000)
> Fix the ranked system so it doesn't match people with those they've reported please.

Implying this is broken in any way.

Because you should totally be able to fine-tune who you get matched with, lol. Let's just report everyone who isn't totally amazing.
If you don't want to play with them, there's the ignore button

It's just by chance. The system can't avoid players that you've reported because then you could just report players that you just don't want to play with and then you wouldn't even be able to be matched in the same game as them. This sounds nice when you think selfishly, but then imagine every single player doing this and then nobody would ever find a game.
Perhaps if the list gets reset every day or so, but to put me in a match immediately after with the same person... Bleh.
